That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck face down into your mana zone tapped. {CRYSTAL MANA} ■ You may turn a card in your mana zone face down. ​(A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.) ■ Crystal Arms 2: If you have 2 or more face down cards in your mana zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MAGIBOMBER}(4) (Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a creature that costs 4 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck face down into your mana zone tapped. {CRYSTAL MANA} ■ You may turn a card in your mana zone face down. ​(A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.) ■ Crystal Arms 2: If you have 2 or more face down cards in your mana zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may open the 'DUEL MASTERS CARD CHRONICLE' and open a page at random. Then choose a creature card on that page. This creature becomes that creature until it leaves the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.
